notifications.mailingListNotificationInfo: Email address was added to the mailing list!
notifications.registrationSuccess: Registration was successful. You can now use your credentials to log in.

landingPage.ensureBenefits: Ensure Your Pet's Best Health Today
landingPage.subBenefits: By subscribing, you'll have access to personalized health management tools, expert veterinary consultations, and timely notifications to keep your furry friend healthy and happy. Don’t miss out on exclusive offers, valuable tips, and a supportive community dedicated to your pet's well-being. Sign up now and take the first step towards giving your pet the care they deserve!
landingPage.card1Info: Keep all your pet's vital information in one place, including medical history, vaccination records, and dietary preferences.
landingPage.card2Info: Schedule and conduct video consultations with licensed veterinarians for expert advice and timely care.
landingPage.card3Info: Receive accurate feeding recommendations tailored to your pet's age, breed, and activity level to ensure balanced nutrition.
landingPage.card4Info: Get timely notifications for important health updates, feed discounts, and upcoming pet events to keep you informed and save you money.
landingPage.askQuestions: Feel free to reach and ask questions
landingPage.aboutUsInfo1HTML: At Petsmay, we're passionate about enhancing the well-being of pets and their owners. Our mission is to simplify pet care through innovative solutions that make managing your pet’s health effortless and enjoyable. From tracking vital health records to providing personalized feeding advice and offering online vet consultations, we aim to be your trusted partner in pet care.
landingPage.aboutUsInfo2HTML: We understand the special bond between pets and their owners, and we're dedicated to supporting you every step of the way. With Petsmay, you'll have access to a comprehensive suite of tools designed to keep your furry friends healthy, happy, and well-cared-for. Join us in revolutionizing pet care and ensure your pet receives the best care possible.
landingPage.whyCHooseInfo1HTML: Comprehensive Health Management: Easily store and access all your pet's medical records, dietary information, and vaccination history in one place.
landingPage.whyCHooseInfo2HTML: Convenient Online Consultations: Book video consultations with licensed veterinarians from the comfort of your home.
landingPage.whyCHooseInfo3HTML: Personalized Care: Get tailored feeding recommendations, health tips, and preventive care plans based on your pet's unique profile.
landingPage.whyCHooseInfo4HTML: Timely Notifications: Receive reminders for vaccinations, alerts about regional disease risks, and discounts on pet products.
landingPage.whyCHooseInfo5HTML: Support and Community: Access grief counseling and connect with other pet owners for advice and support.
landingPage.whyCHooseInfo6HTML: User-Friendly Interface: Enjoy an intuitive app designed to make managing your pet's health easy and hassle-free.
landingPage.whyCHooseInfo7HTML: Trusted Expertise: Rely on accurate and reliable information from our team of veterinary professionals. Choose Petsmay for convenient, comprehensive, and personalized pet care. Sign up today!
landingPage.testimonial1: Petsmay has been a game-changer for managing my dog's health. The online consultations are so convenient, and I love the personalized feeding tips. Highly recommend!
landingPage.testimonial2: This app makes keeping track of my cat's medical records and vaccinations so easy. The timely notifications and support services have been incredibly helpful. Petsmay is a must-have for any pet owner!
landingPage.contactInfo1: Experience the ultimate convenience and peace of mind in managing your pet's health with Petsmay. Our comprehensive, user-friendly app offers everything you need to ensure your furry friend stays happy and healthy. From personalized care recommendations to easy access to veterinary consultations and timely notifications, Petsmay is here to support you every step of the way. Join our growing community of pet owners dedicated to providing the best care for their pets. Sign up now and take the first step towards better pet health!
landingPage.launchInfo: We will let you know whan we are launching
